data.oai_dc:dc: Table of genbank accession numbers for each sample used in this study. Sampling location is provided (Old World, OW, for Eurasian Anas crecca crecca, New World, NW, for North American Anas crecca carolinensis). NA = not applicable (nuclear loci were not sequenced for 94 individuals).
